title: All I Really Need to Know I Learned in Kindergarten
description: Paperback. Pub Date :1990-10-11 171 English HarperCollins UK When asked what he does. Robert Fulghum usually replies that he is a philosopher. and explains that what he likes to do is to think about everyday things and then to express what he thinks by writing. speaking or painting. This is a collection of his favourite observations. written over the years. that reveal simple truths about small lives with big meanings.
author: Robert Fulghum
